cluster_relations.rel_desc: Stories function as warnings directed at listeners.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject issues a warning or cautionary message directed toward the object.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Story and Legend Audiences (including Cautionary Narratives)

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Stories alert their audience to various dangers.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that a narrative or communicative artifact serves to alert an audience to specific risks, harms, or dangers.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Scope: various threats, harms, or risks

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject issues a warning or cautionary message directed toward an audience represented by the object.
args.justification: Refines the canonical predicate to explicitly capture that the object is an audience, aligning with narrative-communication semantics and distinguishing it from warnings about external dangers (as in 'warns_about'). Keeps the existing relation class and group, which are already appropriate.

executed_decisions.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject issues a warning or cautionary message directed toward an audience represented by the object.
executed_decisions.justification: Refines the canonical predicate to explicitly capture that the object is an audience, aligning with narrative-communication semantics and distinguishing it from warnings about external dangers (as in 'warns_about'). Keeps the existing relation class and group, which are already appropriate.
